edu.csulb.cecs277

Class Board

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.csulb.cecs277.Board

  • public class Board
extends java.lang.Object

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Board()
      Board Constructor Creates a basic deck, gives the first half to the player, the gives the remaining cards to the opponent

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean BeginRound()
      Allows external classes to begin a round on the board.
      void CollectCards(boolean isPlayerCards)
      Collects all cards that were played in the round and adds them to the winner's deck
      boolean FollowupRound(boolean isPlayerCard)
      This method performs the functionality of the follow up round for both players if desired

      returns how many cards have been played.

        public void ResetBoard()
        Sets the board up for a new board state

      • BeginRound

        public boolean BeginRound()
        Allows external classes to begin a round on the board.
        Returns:
        boolean - returns whether or not the player won the round.

      • CollectCards

        public void CollectCards(boolean isPlayerCards)
        Collects all cards that were played in the round and adds them to the winner's deck
        Parameters:
        isPlayerCards - - boolean set to true if the player is the winner and gets the cards

      • FollowupRound

        public boolean FollowupRound(boolean isPlayerCard)
        This method performs the functionality of the follow up round for both players if desired
        Parameters:
        isPlayerCard - - boolean that is true of the player is the one requesting followup. False causes the computer to perform the round
        Returns:
        boolean - returns if the followup round was won
